channel.title: [CFM] Noughts and Crosses ~ Mafia wins!
channel.description:
[color=lightgreen]Welcome[/color] = Hello folks and welcome to Noughts and Crosses Mafia! ~~I was totally not forced by @Kirefitten to host this btw~~
[color=lightgreen] Rules[/color] =
[details="Rules"] 1. Follow the Global Forum Rules 2. If you haven’t posted content in 36 hours, you’ll be prodded for inactivity. If you don’t respond to that prod in 16 hours, you will be force replaced. 3. No private messaging others in the game about the game. 4. Do not screenshot private host messages 5. Don’t throw the game. This includes any form of intent to make you or your faction lose 6. Do not use me big boi letters or me colorz 7. Editing is allowed if you are correcting grammar mistakes other than that you need my permission. If you edit before the pen you are ~~spared~~ ok. Also no deleting posts. 8. You can edit quotes for the lulz but other than that no. 9. You ~~can~~ can't Angleshoot! [/details]
[color=lightgreen]Gameplay[/color] = [details="Gameplay stuff"]
[details="Day/Night stuff"] * Days will be 72 hours long. * Nights will be 24 hours long, or shorter if everyone sent their actions in. [/details]
[details="Class stuff"] * Actions are done by messaging me. * All classes will be used, and will be used as they are found in the game. * When you receive a card you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it. [/details]
[details="Mafia stuff"] * Mafia have a factional kill. * Mafia also have a day/night chat. * A mafia kill on someone causes a nought * Scum wins when there is a lower or equal amount of town or they get 3 noughts tic tac toe like [/details]
[details="Town stuff"] * A lynch on someone causes a cross * Town wins when the scum have been defeated or they get 3 crosses tic tac toe like [/details]
[details="Lynch stuff"] * To accuse someone say "**/accuse [player]**" or "**/vote [player]**" * To resend some say "**/unvote [player]**" or "**/unvote**" * Majority lynch isn't in play, instead EoD lynch is in place with no lynch. There are no trials however [/details]
[details="Journals/DNs stuff"] * Journals/DNs do not exist [/details]
[/details]
[color=lightgreen]To Pre In[/color] = To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to pre join" or "/pre join" or "/ pre in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want
Rolelist:
**[color=red] Mafia Goon [/color]** **[color=red] Mafia Goon [/color]** **[color=green] Innocent Child[/color]** **[color=green] Citizen[/color]** **[color=green] Citizen[/color]** **[color=green]Citizen[/color]** **[color=green]Citizen[/color]** **[color=green]Citizen[/color]** **[color=green]Citizen[/color]**
Players:
1. Marluxion 2. MaximusPrime 3. Unknown 4. Omfgcookies 7. Hippolytus :crown: (Innocent Child Crown) 8. Firekitten 9. Margaret 1. Memesky 1. Captain
Spectator: 1. Marcus
Graveyard:
HTM - died D0, was [color=lightgreen] Anime Lion [/color]
[color=lightgreen] Board [/color] = [details="Board"] ![image|519x500](upload://xCZsnEN6nfkd9laLUbWD5tMv8Vr.jpg) [/details]
[color=lightgreen] Classcards: [/color] =
[details="Mafia Goon"] > [color=red] Mafia Goon [/color] >= > [color=red] **Mafia** [/color] > Welcome to the game! You are a Mafia Goon with XXXXX. You may talk to him/her at any time, via either PM or Discord. Each night, between the two of you, you have a kill to use. > > _You win when there is a lower or equal amount of town or get 3 noughts_ [/details]
[details="Innocent Child"] > [color=green] Innocent Child [/color] >= > [color=green] **Town** [/color] > > You are an Innocent Child. Your alignment is revealed on the first post during the day. > > _You win when you defeat the scum or get 3 crosses_ [/details]
[details="Citizen"] > [color=green] Citizen [/color] >= > [color=green] **Town** [/color] > > You are a Vanilla Citizen. You don't have any special powers, and you don't know who the mafia is. Your only power is your voice, and your vote. > > _You win when you defeat the scum or get 3 crosses_ [/details]
[color=lightgreen]**Game Events:**[/color] = Nothing cuz game hasn't started

You win when there is a lower or equal amount of town or get 3 noughts

Htm:

You win when you defeat the scum or get 3 crosses

Doesn’t this mean both wincons can be achieved simultaneously.
